data.message:
TREEBY - SERIOUS CRASH
10:34pm
Serious crash on Armadale Rd, Treeby. Police and tow trucks on site. Road is closed eastbound near Tapper Rd. Road will be closed for some time. Best to seek an alternate route.

WEMBLEY - INCIDENT 
10:19pm
Road blocked Cambridge St at Harborne St. Car v pedestrian. Expect delays.

REGIONAL EAST - MERREDIN - FIRE
10:55pm
Admin can confirm it's just an over-enthusiastic bonfire in a backyard. Volunteer firies now have it under control.

10:43pm
Major fire at the corner of Endersbee St and Morton St, Merredin.

10:40pm
Emergency services alarm activated in Merredin. According to a local this is a call for all volunteer rescue services to sign in for duty, usually indicating a major incident. If anyone has any news please update us!

HILLARYS
10.00pm
RBT Hepburn Ave eastbound as you head up the hill after the second roundabout leaving Hillarys. 

9.47pm
One car RBT on Hepburn Ave just set up heading eastbound towards Marmion Ave. They are pulling 3-4 cars over at a time. Drive safely!!

CANNING VALE - STILL THERE
10.20pm
Booze bus still on Nicholson Road targeting drug drivers. No line up of cops bus is parked in the car park at Livingstone shopping centre with 3 marked cars and 1 unmarked silver commodore patrolling the streets. Drive responsibly!! 

8.49pm
Booze bus at Livingston Shopping Centre on Nicholson Road, Canning Vale. Police are blitzing surrounding roads.
data.name: Perth WA Revenue Raisers Alert

data.message:

8.28pm

A.W has been on site with their home made sign again. Hopefully a few see this one and receive the heads up!!

Roadside FFC (speed camera) hiding in dark bushes Kwinana Freeway after Berrigan Drive southbound.

BIBRA LAKE - POLICE INCIDENT 
7.50pm
Bibra Drive at the start of Progress Drive was closed all directions. Heaps of police and emergency services on site with a Harley Davidson in the middle of it all. Depending on where tours going it could be a massive detour for some. Just be aware and follow directions if you still choose to pass through.  👍🏼

GLENDALOUGH
9.27pm
Booze bus on Powis St still there just off the Mitchell Fwy northbound exit.

Booze bus still there Powis St westbound just as you get off Mitchell Fwy.

Motorcycle crash Mitchell Fwy northbound after Whitfords Ave. Traffic is banked a long way! Hope the motorcycle rider will recover.

Crash northbound Mitchell Freeway 400m before Ocean Reef Rd exit. Motorcycle vs car. Traffic at a standstill banked far back. 

6.15pm
Been a crash Mitchell Fwy northbound after Whitfords Train Station. Traffic banked all the way back past Warwick Rd and maybe beyond. Avoid at all costs!!

Accident northbound on Mitchell Fwy before Ocean Reef Road. Looks like it was bike vs car. Right and middle lanes blocked. Traffic at standstill. Seek an alternate route. 

5.54pm
Accident Mitchell Freeway just before Ocean Reef Road heading northbound. Traffic at a standstill. Motorcyclist down. Avoid the right lanes. Expect heavy delays on approach.

data.message:
**NOTICE - NICHOLSON ROAD CLOSURE**

Bridge beams will be installed this weekend. This means Nicholson Rd will be closed between Bannister Rd and Yale Rd / Garden St roundabout. The times are as follows:

Start: 8.00pm Friday 6 October 
Finish: 5.00am Monday 9 October 

Please plan your journeys accordingly to avoid delays. Visit the Main Roads WA website for more info:

https://www.mainroads.wa.gov.au/UsingRoads/RoadTrafficInformation/roadworks/MetroWorksEvents/Pages/MetroWorksEvents.aspx

THORNLIE - STILL THERE
1.02pm
FFC (speed camera) on corner of Wilfred Rd & Dove Street, Thornlie.

***DAILY LOCATIONS - FRIDAY 6 OCTOBER***

Good morning all. Here are Friday's listed speed camera locations. This list is a useful guide but be advised that you may still come across the occasional camera that isn't listed. The list isn't by any means exclusive.
 
If you see or hear of any speed cameras, traffic police activity or other occurrences on the road please let us know by messaging us directly or posting in the visitor's post section! Even if your sightings have already been reported to us always inform us anyway as we can then confirm the latest sighting of that report. We often rely on YOUR info to make posts and inform other followers!!
 
Apart from that enjoy the day, drive safely and don't get pinged by any speed traps! Let's get through the most favoured day of the week without incurring an infringement!!

JOONDALUP - POSSIBLE POLICE PURSUIT
1.35am
There's several police cars with sirens and polair chopper overhead around the Joondalup area. Anybody able to confirm any police pursuits in the area or surrounds? Be very vigilant!!

COMO  
10.03pm
Police pulling people over on Kent Street near the Kent Street / Hayman Road roundabout in Como. Presuming it's an RBT. Drive safely!!

SHELLEY
10.17pm
RBT bus setting up on Leach Hwy westbound after Shelley Bridge. Drive responsibly!!

ATTADALE
10.20pm
Couple of police cars doing RBT's on Canning Hwy, Attadale at the bottom of the hill before BP service station.

COCKBURN CENTRAL - POWER RESTORED
10.21pm
Power has been restored once more. Nothing to worry about!!

10.07pm
Atwell, Cockburn Central, Success, Treeby and Banjup. There are power outages in all these areas so proceed with caution! 

10.05pm
Just a heads up the whole east side of Cockburn Central has no power at all. The traffic lights are out and so are the streetlights. Emergency services are on site possibly fixing something. Please take extreme caution while in the area!

RIVERTON - POLICE BLITZ 
9.52pm
Booze bus in the car park of Riverton Coles along High Road. Admin assumes they could be blitzing surrounding roads in the area and taking offenders back to the bus. Drive safely!

GREENFIELDS - NOT LISTED TODAY
9.00pm
Speed camera on Mandjoogoordap Drive leaving Mandurah in the usual spot just after the Gordon Road bridge.

*admin assumes this one has since packed away and departed.

SWAN VIEW - STILL THERE
8.58pm
Single police car Morrison Road out the front of Swan View Primary School conducting RBT's.

OAKFORD

SUCCESS - SERIOUS POLICE INCIDENT CLEARED
4.58pm
Serious incident in progress on the Armadale Road bridge facing northbound traffic over the Kwinana Fwy. Police cars and bikes are everywhere. Let's hope the outcome is the best one for everyone.

UPDATE: another follower has claimed that there is nothing happening. Hopefully that means the situation, if the previous report is true, was de-escalated before anything bad happened.
